sect2.title: Contents
sect2.para: Major programs in quanta include kxsldbg and quanta.

sect3.title: kxsldbg
sect3.para: kxsldbg is a GUI front-end to xsldbg, the XSLT debugger.

sect3.title: quanta
sect3.para: quanta is a Web IDE that strives to be neutral and transparent to all markup languages, while supporting popular web-based scripting languages, CSS, and other emerging W3C recommendations.
